page.title: 18HEADLAND HOTEL COVERACK
page.content: Headland Hotel Coverack The Head land Hotel has 34 bedrooms and can accomodate up to 65 guests. Many come from London and the Southeast of England.Some come from the Plymouth area and the rest from all over England,America,Europe and the World. University parties come to study the rare plants,birds,geology and rock life. In 1985 a double room with sea view and bath cost Â£23-75 for bed and breakfast. Menu.Carrot and orange soup.Ham,cheese and apple cocktail,Local Lemon sole,Roast leg of lamb with rosemary and apple jelly,Choice from the sweet trolly and coffee. A vegetarian menu includes Nutroast with Tangy Sauce and vegetable curry.
